title: Deluxe Room
description: Our deluxe rooms are spacious and elegantly decorated, featuring comfortable beds, a large bathroom with a shower and tub, and a private balcony with stunning views of the surrounding area.
amenities: Large bathroom with shower and tub

title: Suite Room
description: Our suite rooms are the epitome of luxury, featuring a separate living room, a king-sized bed, a large bathroom with a shower and tub, and a private balcony with breathtaking views. Perfect for couples or families.
amenities: Large bathroom with shower and tub

title: Family Room
description: Our family rooms are perfect for families or groups of friends, featuring two queen-sized beds, a separate living area, and a large bathroom with a shower and tub. Enjoy stunning views from the private balcony.
amenities: Large bathroom with shower and tub

title: Superior Room
description: Our Superior Rooms offer comfortable and stylish accommodations, perfect for a relaxing and enjoyable stay. Each room features a queen-sized bed, a seating area with comfortable chairs, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with a shower and bathtub. Our Superior Rooms are cozy and inviting, offering the perfect blend of comfort and convenience.
amenities: Private bathroom with shower and bathtub

title: Luxury Suite
description: Our Luxury Suites are spacious and beautifully appointed, featuring a separate living area, comfortable bedding, and a private balcony with stunning views. These suites are equipped with a flat-screen TV, mini-fridge, and coffee/tea making facilities. Room size: 550 sq.ft.

title: Premier Room
description: Our Premier Rooms offer guests a more spacious and luxurious experience, featuring a separate living area, comfortable bedding, and a private balcony with stunning views. These rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, mini-fridge. Each room features a queen-sized bed, a seating area with comfortable chairs, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with a shower and bathtub. Our Superior Rooms are cozy and inviting, offering the perfect blend of comfort and convenience
amenities: Large bathroom with shower and tub

title: Villa Room
description: A luxurious room that typically includes a separate living area and bedroom, making it ideal for travelers who value extra space and privacy. This room time: is perfect for couples or families who want a bit of extra space and luxury during their stay.
